sentences.en: "Thanks friend," he said, while sweeping the money into his pocket.
sentences.cn: “谢了，朋友，”他说着就把钱划拉进了口袋。

sentences.en: An overnight stay at a friend's house disorients me.
sentences.cn: 在朋友家过夜让我觉得晕晕乎乎的。

sentences.en: Fortunately for me, my friend saw that something was seriously wrong.
sentences.cn: 对我来说幸运的是，我的朋友发现了非常严重的错误。

sentences.en: Gifford was a friend. I'd known him for nine years.
sentences.cn: 吉福德是我的一位朋友。我和他认识9年了。

sentences.en: Harry dismissed his old friend's speech as "a nine-day wonder"
sentences.cn: 哈里对老朋友的讲话不屑一顾，称之“火不了多久”。

sentences.en: Have I been neglectful of my friend, taking him for granted?
sentences.cn: 我是不是对朋友不够尽心，太不把他当回事了？

sentences.en: He was a personal friend whom I've known for many many years.
sentences.cn: 他是一位我认识多年的私人朋友。

sentences.en: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

sentences.en: How do we know you're not just covering up for your friend?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么知道你不只是在为自己的朋友遮掩呢？

sentences.en: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.cn: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

sentences.en: I might buy one for a friend's birthday as a giggle.
sentences.cn: 我可能会买一件送给朋友当生日礼物，逗他开心。

sentences.en: I take it you're a friend of the Kellings, Mr Burr.
sentences.cn: 伯尔先生，想必您是凯林家的朋友吧？

sentences.en: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
My son has suffered terribly. He has lost his best friend.
sentences.cn: 我儿子遭受了巨大痛苦，他失去了最要好的朋友。

sentences.en: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.en: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.cn: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.en: The encouragement of a friend spurred Chris into switching jobs.
sentences.cn: 在一位朋友的鼓励下，克理斯换了工作。

sentences.en: You wouldn't leave an old friend in the lurch, surely?
sentences.cn: 你总不会对老朋友见死不救吧？

sentences.en: You've been my best friend ever since we started in the infants.
sentences.cn: 自从我们上幼儿园起，你就是我最好的朋友。
